entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
